code: import axios from"axios";import{app}from"./app-instance";var authInstance=axios.create({baseURL:"https://foodforconcentration.herokuapp.com/"});export var login=function login(loginForm){return authInstance.post("auth/login",loginForm);};export var register=function register(registerForm){return authInstance.post("auth/register",registerForm);};export var newPatientPassword=function newPatientPassword(newPasswordForm){return app.post("api/users/new-password",newPasswordForm);};
